mapper.sql: id, suid, uid, pwd, username, sex, regtime, updateuid, updatetime, email, user_type, pay_user, pay_type, pay_tel, pay_remark, remark, usource, flag, checkuid, checktime, company, agent, telflag, emailflag, usericon, birthdate, citycode, nickname, autoflag
mapper.select: SELECT uid,min(regtime) AS regtime from userlist INNER JOIN dic_user_type.user_type_code = userlist.user_type WHERE dic_user_type.type in ('dm','creprice') group by uid having 1=1

select DISTINCT dic_user_type.intro FROM userlist INNER JOIN dic_user_type on dic_user_type.user_type_code = userlist.user_type WHERE uid = #{Uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND dic_user_type.type IN ('dm','creprice') order by userlist.id
select DISTINCT userlist.regtime from userlist where uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY userlist.id
select DISTINCT userlist.pay_tel from userlist WHERE uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY userlist.id
select userlist.id from userlist WHERE uid = #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND flag=1
